mapper.select: select * from event order by reporting_date desc limit 0, 3
mapper.insert: insert into event(store_filename, upload_filename, path, title, content, start_date, end_date, reporting_date, thum_store_filename, thum_upload_filename, thum_path, view_count) values (#{storeFilename}, #{uploadFilename}, #{path}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{reportingDate}, #{thumStoreFilename}, #{thumUploadFilename}, #{thumPath}, 0)
